text:
@dx619hey I just meant it as a joke, I don't actually believe there's a problem with the difficulty. =/
What I should have said is that if you think it can't get any harder, you're wrong. =P
author: SamuraiSonic

text:
Another gem of a game! One of the hardest ever! 

Goooooooooooooooooo SUPER MEAT BOOOOOOOOOOOOY!!!
author: Boyce18

text: @SamuraiSonic If it's a smooth curve throughout, how can that be a problem? It feels so rewarding to beat the later stages, and look badass. Also, I wouldn't count the warp zones, since they're bonus stages, and it makes sense.
author: dx619hey

text: @Rookie8254 agreed
author: dx619hey

text:
@SupraDarky I agree with dx619hey, the difficulty curve never jumps bar a few warp zones (I'm looking at you World 5 secret character). The problem with the difficulty curve is that it doesn't seem to know when to stop. =P
Completing the game is difficult, but definitely possible. Getting 100% however...
author: SamuraiSonic

text: Nothing beats "Hot Damned" imo

text: Yup, it's the best track from the game.

text: "Betus Blues" tops my list, as does "Rocket Rider."  Definitely suggest you check them out.

text: Not a bad song but I think Hell's levels music is the best.

text: @SupraDarky The difficulty progresses smoothly, never really spiking unexpectedly. It's a doable hard game, and designed very well.

text: i never knew that this was a real videogame until you uploaded this :O
author: Jirt

text: @SupraDarky You'd be surprised. Every level has that impossible feel. Then you get to it and it is. But you keep playing because it's fun. And later on at the third level you realize "Oh wait a second, I beat that level before?! When did that happen?" It's just good old fashioned fun and nothing else.
author: Arc13

text: In my opinion, there are plenty of songs better than this one in Super Meat Boy, such as both of The Hospital  worlds. That's just me though. You ought to play this game SupraDarky. It's tough, but it's forgiving in the sense that there is no penalty for losing or even time to mourn the death as you're respawned a second later.
author: SeijinMahoutsukai

text: This song is awesome but the whole level is just freakin crazy!  Great stuff.
author: spaceinator73

text: I watched my friend play this. Holy crap. Its insanity.
author: daneofurexistence

text: Hells yeah, loved this entire game. The music really pumps you up. 100%ing it on a keyboard was a lot more fun because of these catchy themes.

text: Boy this is a Super Neat song. :P

text: @insanetrickster This is one of the best games this generation!!! Possibly the best XBLA game out there. I know this mind sound a bit cliche but you have to give it a try before talking about the gameplay, especially if you like challenges.

text: Never got into it, mostly because instead of fun level design it's all about dodging buzzsaws. Other people seem to love it, and more power to them. I just didn't care for it.

text: One of the best games I played this year. Super challenging, but not unfair.

text: I have this game on Steam but I have yet to play it. My backlog is pretty crazy, but I should get to it soonish as it's been greatly reviewed by the press and the players. I saw some bonus levels I think to unlock other characters and they seemed almost impossible to beat. I'm not sure I'll be able to go through those !
